cnn.title: Hundreds of Palestinians dead and hundreds of Israelis killed in bloody confrontations with the Israeli defence
cnn.author: John Doe

content.text: In a tragic turn of events, a bloody confrontation between Palestinians and Israelis has resulted in the loss of lives on both sides.
content.semantics: Confrontations between armed forces? Civilians? Or between civilians and armed forces?

content.text: The conflict escalated quickly, leaving 100 Palestinians dead and 100 Israelis killed.
Tensions have been high in the region, with international leaders calling for an immediate ceasefire and diplomatic resolution.
The situation remains volatile, and efforts are underway to bring an end to the violence and find a path towards peace.

sky.title: Stray bullet makes its way into a van and killed 3 year old Palestinian lady
sky.author: Jane Smith

content.text: A stray bullet killed an 3-year-old Palestinian girl in her kitchen Saturday as Israeli troops fired on her neighborhood in the southern Gaza Strip, relatives and hospital officials said.
content.semantics: Does a bullet accidentally fly into the head of a 3 year old 'lady'? Why was the neighborhood fired at? The incident raises questions about the safety of civilians in conflict zones.

content.text: Iman Tulbeh was shot in the head as soldiers fired toward al-Amal neighborhood in the town of Khan Yunis, witnesses said.
The Israeli military said terrorists had fired a rocket from the area and troops returned fire. The army said it was investigating the shooting.
content.semantics: What evidence is there to support the Israeli military's claim that terrorists fired a rocket? Were there any civilian casualties from the Israeli troops' return fire?

content.text: And in Gaza City, the militant group Hamas extended a fundraising drive late Friday after thousands of Palestinians were still lined up to donate. Hamas said in mosques Friday that it needed money to destroy Jews.
content.semantics: Does it really say that? Is it mentioned in their charter?

content.text: A stray bullet killed an 3-year-old Palestinian girl in her kitchen Saturday as Israeli troops fired on her neighborhood in the southern Gaza Strip, relatives and hospital officials said.
content.semantics: Does a bullet accidentally fly into the head of a 3 year old 'lady'? Why was the neighborhood fired at?

content.text: Iman Tulbeh was shot in the head as soldiers fired toward al-Amal neighborhood in the town of Khan Yunis, witnesses said.
The Israeli military said terrorists had fired a rocket from the area and troops returned fire. The army said it was investigating the shooting.

And in Gaza City, the militant group Hamas extended a fundraising drive late Friday after thousands of Palestinians were still lined up to donate. Hamas said in mosques Friday that it needed money to destroy Jews.
